_header: Harken all good men if ye been wise and sly
Note: This text is a later recension of 2165.
_description: The Assumption of the Virgin Mary, in one MS of the South English Legendary — 364 long lines in couplets

Lam223.First Lines:
HErkenes alle gode men ȝif ȝe ben wise & slyeAnd I
                    wole to ȝow rede þe Assumpcioun of Marie…
Lam223.Last Lines:
…Wonderly þai þider come & wonderly þai went
                    þenÞurȝ hir bedes crist toke ȝeme for his moder bone of
                    all monkynne . Amen
